property.name: bl.mr.seq.blastall.log.level
property.description: logging level, specified as a logging module literal; defaults to 'WARNING'

property.name: bl.mr.seq.blastall.db.name
property.description: The BLAST database name (REQUIRED). A BLAST db is typically obtained by running the formatdb command on one or more fasta files. The archive provided through mapred.cache.archives MUST contain BLAST db files beginning with the db name (DB_NAME.nin, etc.)

property.name: bl.mr.seq.blastall.program
property.description: The BLAST program to use ('blastn', 'blastp', etc.); defaults to 'blastn'

property.name: mapred.cache.archives
property.description: distributed cache entry (HDFS_PATH#LINK_NAME) for an archive containing the pre-formatted db files at the top level, i.e., no directories
